front.title: Gap Analysis for Meeting Emergency Telecommunications Service (ETS) Requirements with DIFFSERV and MPLS in a Single IP Telephony Domain

abstract.t: This document presents a gap analysis for meeting ETS requirements using DIFFSERV and MPLS with reference to one particular network scenario: implementing Internet Telecommunications Disaster Recovery (ETS) service in the context of IP Telephony in a private IP network designed, engineered and managed with telephony (using DIFFSERV and MPLS) as the dominant application.
